definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Don't use steel utensils on Teflon cookware.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用特富龍炊具餐具鋼。

sentences.english: Teflon Classic 2 layers non stick coating for healthier way of cooking and easy cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 採用兩層特富龍不粘塗層，烹飪更健康，易清洗。

sentences.english: Put teflon tape onto fill plug, then install.
sentences.chinese: 把特富龍磁帶上填寫插頭，然後再安裝。
